dropdownOverlay.notes: Migrated boilerplate header does not create a semi-transparent overlay behind dropdown panels

notes: Header background remains solid white (#fff) in all states - matches original
No background change on hover or dropdown open - matches original
No utility bar exists in migrated version (original has black utility bar with Vendors and Suppliers link)
Migrated header has border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e7e8 (original has no border)
Desktop position is relative (original was static)
Mobile position is fixed (original behavior unknown from analysis)
No semi-transparent overlay behind dropdown panels (original has overlay with 0.5 opacity)
Dropdown panels use light-color (#e6e7e8) background, positioned absolute below nav item
Standard boilerplate click-to-toggle dropdown behavior (original uses hover-to-open)
No megamenu support in migrated header (original Industries has megamenu with two-column layout)

parityGaps.original: Black background bar at top with Vendors and Suppliers link
Semi-transparent dark overlay (opacity 0.5) behind dropdown panels
Hover to open, hover-out to close
Industries has two-column megamenu with categories + sub-panels
